page.title: 02TRADE_SHOPPING IN HEADINGLEY
page.content: ON 16TH MAY 1985 MY CLASS DID A QUESTIONNAIRE AT THE ARNDALE SHOPPING CENTRE.WE INTERVIEWED 30 PEOPLE AND WHEN WE GOT BACK TO SCHOOL WE MADE GRAPHS TO SHOW THE RESULTS OF OUR QUESTIONAIRE.NEARLY ALL THE PEOPLE INTERVIEWED SAID "THEY USED SAFEWAYS SUPERMARKET."THIS WAS THE MOST POPULAR SHOP.12 PEOPLE USED THE POST OFFICE REGULAR.WE FOUND OUT THAT SOME OTHERS FACILITIES ARE NEEDED.MOST PEOPLE SAID "THERE SHOULD BE A CAFE AND SOME PUBLIC TOILETS."LOTS OF PEOPLE WANTED TO SEE MORE FLOWERS AND TWO PEOPLE THOUGHT ANOTHER PUB WAS NEEDED.I THINK THERE SHOULD BE SOME MORE CONVENIENT PLACES TO PARK CARS AND ALSO SOME SAFE PLACES FOR PARENTS TO LEAVE CHILDREN WHILST THEY ARE SHOPPING. CHARLOTTE HALLAM 9
